dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Continue your recent work or select a project from the sidebar.
dashboard.noConversations: No recent conversations. Select a project from the sidebar to start one!

empty.title: No approval requests
empty.description: Approval requests from Plan mode will appear here.

dialog.title: Review Plan
dialog.description: Review the plan and select a model to execute it.

approveDialog.title: Approve & Execute Plan
approveDialog.description: Select a model to execute this plan in Agent mode.

agents.title: Agent Manager
agents.description: Orchestration features are currently disabled or undergoing refactoring.

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.description: View MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers configured in your AI CLI tools
mcp.allServersDesc: Servers from all supported CLI tools
mcp.configureHint: Configure servers in Gemini CLI or Claude to see them here.
mcp.comingSoon: Coming Soon: Enable/disable MCP servers per session, add custom servers, and view available tools from each server.

rules.title: Global Rules
rules.createDesc: Enter a name for the new rule (e.g., "Coding Standards", "Git Workflow").
rules.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?

settings.title: Settings
settings.languageDesc: Select the language for the user interface.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.desc: Control OS notifications for agent runs.
notifications.approvalsDesc: Send approval requests to additional channels.

openai.title: OpenAI API
openai.desc: Used for OpenAI API agent and compatible services.
openai.baseUrlDesc: Custom endpoint for Azure OpenAI or compatible APIs.

gemini.title: Gemini API
gemini.baseUrlDesc: Custom endpoint for Gemini API proxy.

chat.startPrompt: Send a message to start working with your agent.
